1497.question: How is performance measured?

7-Figure3-1.png: Performance is measured using the threshold-averaged Receiver Operating Characteristic (ROC) curve.</s>
Performance is measured using the Threshold-averaged Receiver Operating Characteristic (ROC) curve.</s>
7-Table1-1.png: Performance is measured using the area under the curve (AUC).</s>
Performance is measured using the Area Under the Curve (AUC).</s>

1497.answer: they use ROC curves and cross-validation
